p:
Blood samples were collected before ART initiation. We sequenced partial HIV-1 pol region as previously described (
7 ,
9 ). We set the mixed mutation calling threshold at >10%, consistent with Sanger sequencing sensitivity (
10 ). We identified major DRMs by using the Stanford University Genotypic Resistance Interpretation HVdb version 8.9, ( https://hivdb.stanford.edu). We inferred the genetic transmission network as previously described (
7 ,
9 ,
11 ); we inferred putative linkage for genetic distances <1.5% (
12 ) ( Appendix).
